name: Vegan Buddha Bowl
steps:
Roast sweet potatoes in the oven at 400Â°F for 20 minutes.
Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Massage kale with olive oil until tender.
Mix tahini with lemon juice and a bit of water for dressing.
Assemble bowl with quinoa, chickpeas, sweet potatoes, and kale.
Drizzle with tahini dressing and serve.
